name: MyMVP
description: Using 3rd party APIs, our end-user to search their favourite NBA player to see the latest season stats as well as a career highlights video and display GIFs.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: A weather dashboard that allows the user to search cities to see the current weather and a 5 day forecast. This application will run in the browser and feature dyna

name: Tiny Steps AU
description: An app which helps users develop a healthy habit by maintaining motivation and sending reminders. Select a pre-defined healthy habit or enter your own personal habit you want to develop and check-in when the habit is completed.

name: Note taker app
description: An app which allows the user to create, save and delete notes.

name: Responsive day planner
description: This was an assignment to create a simple calendar application that allows the user to save events for each hour of the day, with dynamic colour coding dependant on the time.

name: Employee Manager CLI
description: An app which allows the user to search, view, update and delete employees.
